Compassionate developer of people and talent to effectuate outstanding results.

Capital Systems Development Manager Intel Corporation October 1998  –  October 2005  (7 years 1 month) Santa Clara,CA Built an organization to develop algorithms and databases to manage capital and capacity of entire fab network. 
 
✔ Minimized annual fab equipment capital ($B) forecast error rate from 10% to 2% by integrating capacity and capital decision support systems across Intel’s fab network. 
✔ Enabled equipment capital reuse $300 million per annum through optimization across factory network.
